segments.text: Hello , this is Hilton Hotel . How may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi . I would like to make a reservation on this Friday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . What kind of room do you want ? We have single rooms , twin rooms , double rooms and suites available on Friday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want a single room with ocean view . Do you have one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When do you check in ? How long are you planning to stay ? Do you have any special requirements ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess I am going to arrive at 9:00 in the morning and I would like to leave at 200 in the afternoon on Sunday . Please give me a room away from the elevator . I hate noises while I am sleeping .
segments.speaker: S2
